thread.section_title: Casablanca Hotel by Library Hotel Collection - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A TRUE GEM IN TIMES SQUARE
thread.title_full: A TRUE GEM IN TIMES SQUARE - Review of Casablanca Hotel by Library Hotel Collection, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: trishs159
title: A TRUE GEM IN TIMES SQUARE
text:
My husband and I have stayed at the Casablanca many times. The staff is so welcoming. We spent my birthday there this time. My husband had to the staff it was my birthday. When we arrived back in our room that day, a bottle of wine, glasses and a card wishes me a happy birthday from the staff was in our room. They do go above and beyond.
Room Tip: Enjoy the 5:00 - 8:00 wine and cheese. See more room tips
